alert.note: Alert for Coastal Georgetown; Inland Georgetown (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 2:37PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Georgetown County through 315 PM EDT... At 237 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Graves, or near Georgetown, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, DeBordieu Colony, Pawleys Island, Murrells Inlet, Plantersville, Graves, Yauhannah, Oatland, Litchfield Beach, Georgetown Memorial Hospital and Waccamaw Community Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
